title: Love it, few suggestions.
text: I absolutely love this game but I would like a few changes. First, it is so annoying when I have to wait 5 minutes or longer to join another game because it disconnected and says I disconnected on purpose(How do you even do that?). Second, I would like it if there was a default pet that is free and a few default skins for the unlucky people who aren‚Äôt allowed to purchase them. Third, new skins, maybe some that are dresses because I have met some females that play this game and find it very sexist. Fourth, I would like it if more than one person could be the same color at the same time. Fifth, there needs to be a map update. Sixth, more skin colors. Seventh, I am very annoyed because I did not get this game before Halloween and I am not able to wear the Halloween hats and I do not want to wait till next Halloween to get them so I think you should make them available for every one who bought this game after Halloween. Finally, there should be an option in the host game menu where you can customize the amount of players and the amount of Imposters or make the player numbers go to at least 15. Other than that I think this game is amazing and I hope it stays that way.

title: Great game but the update????
text: I have been playing among us with my friends in the end of 2019. It has been an amazing game. But there is one problem. The new update for the anti hackers. Look I understand that this update is to prevent hackers from hacking but cmon. It has been kicking out people like crazy. One time I played among us for an entire hour and when I finally got to be the role of the imposter it just kicked me off the game saying that ‚ÄúThe game options you have been playing on are too old, you may need an update. This game needs to have another update. No body can play normally anymore. Plus, the update to ‚Äúprevent hacking‚Äù is not working. Multiple times I have entered games and not even 1 or 2 seconds in to the game someone presses the emergency meeting saying the 2 imposters. And their right. The first time it happened I thought it was luck but it kept happening in every game. Now I realize that each and everyone of those games were hackers. So this update did not do anything to prevent hackers from hacking but it destroyed my gameplay. Please developers if you are seeing this. Please respond to me saying that you guys are working on something because nobody can play the game anymore. Thank you for listening and goodbye.üëãüèª

title: Among Us
text:
Ok, so I have been playing Among Us for a long time now and I really liked it so far, but there are some  new features you need to add. Features: You really need to have a friend button because you play with someone then you get disconnected and then you never see them again but, if we had a friend button we could both accept in game and if someone had to leave it would say they‚Äôre offline and then when they get online you can join there games (If its not already full). Another feature we need is game modes. We need game modes because what if we don‚Äôt want to keep playing the same old round again and again so you could add some game modes. I will list some examples, Kill out: You all are impostors and have to kill each other before someone kills you, last man standing wins. Everyone Vents: This is a game mode where you can have everyone vent, even if you are a crew mate (If you are impostor, you can‚Äôt kill in vents. 100 People: This is a game mode where servers are allowed to have 100 people in your game. There are 5 Impostors who have to kill everybody.
That is all the features, now let‚Äôs move onto the bugs.

title: Great Game, But 2 Bugs And 2 Suggestions, so please read.
text:
I love this game, it‚Äôs so fun! It‚Äôs a Game of betrayal and backstabbing. However, there‚Äôs a few suggestions and bugs I would like to point out! First of all, when I‚Äôm playing the airship map, I hear this strange noise like a hammer bashing a metal surface over and over again. It continues all the time until you restart the game. It also sounds 2x faster then a normal hammer bashing a surface, which makes it disturbing. Another bug is that, sometimes in all the maps, I can‚Äôt move. I can‚Äôt a call meeting, I can‚Äôt do anything. I‚Äôm forced to leave the game.  I have a suggestion for adding a friends list. I hate it when I make an among us friend, and he or she leaves and I never see them again. I would love it if you could add them as a friend and join them again. Another suggestion is about the recent update. I know you‚Äôre trying to keep us safe by not telling any private information, but I would love to change my user name and make friends. Maybe just add a chat filter, like the game Roblox. And you also restrict some usernames. That way, we can have fun and be safe. 

- Good Regards, Freja. 
P.S: Sorry about the sarcastic comment. My brother did it.

title: MUST READ!
text: The game is very addicting and very fun at the same time! I think that you should think about adding a few new features. First, I personally like to play free play a lot and it would be a lot more fun if the ‚ÄúDummies‚Äù would actually play and not just stand there. I would hope that they would be smart by, being impostor, reporting, calling emergency meetings, sabotaging, completing tasks, and just overall being pretty smart. Like in other games you can hardly tell that you are playing the computer but in among us you can clearly tell the difference. Also, I like how when you are impostor and you sabotage something like electricity you can see as the impostor but not the crew mates. I do not like however how whenever you are leaving a private game with your friends which is what I do to make a new game because some of my friends didn‚Äôt join in time, you have to wait five minutes before you can play in another game. I play with my friends a whole bunch and it would be nice if that feature could be turned off. Overall this is an amazing game and I think that everyone ages 9 and up will enjoy it a whole lot and I highly recommend this amazing app!

title: Great game!
text:
I really like this game. It is very addictive, and with the reporting system they recently added, it‚Äôs been a lot better without toxic people. I have an issue, though. My friend got the game, but it didn‚Äôt let her create an account. Thus, she was stuck with the quick chat, which gave her less options. I‚Äôd appreciate it if you fixed this :). Another issue is that I made an in-game skin purchase, but I didn‚Äôt get the skin after a while of trying. This would also be appreciated if you were to fix it. But, no pressure! Otherwise, it‚Äôs an amazing game and I play it often, especially with the new map. Speaking of which, there‚Äôs also a glitch that in the beginning of a game, there‚Äôs a black screen for around ten seconds before you get loaded in. Once, I had the black screen for a while, and when it finally loaded, the game said Defeat. It was pretty funny, but a bit annoying. Another visual bug is that whenever someone is walking, their character model is blurry and looks like it had trouble loading. This happens with v-sync and without. Other than that, not much is wrong!
Overall, this is an amazing game and I like it a lot, but there are some very obvious glitches. I highly recommend it.

title: Um??? Please Read!?!
text: Dear creator of this game. I just played this game a few minutes ago and I normally play it  everyday, and I went to someone‚Äôs game to try to get imposter, and I noticed that the ‚Äúshh‚Äù button didn‚Äôt show up so I waited for a few seconds and it popped up then. I just thought it was a glitch because so many people play this game and it‚Äôs crowded. Then I spawned into the map and there was a HUGE random vent in the middle of the room and I know that 10 players (including me) were playing in that game, and only 4 random people showed up when it said I was a ‚Äúcrew mate‚Äù and they were all orange which I knew my color was purple. And all of our names were turned into ‚ÄúCheeseman‚Äù which was the hosts name. Then also the button on the cafeteria table was HUGE as well. And I could look into storage and there also was glitching and lagging. Then, a lot of people that joined left the game and I stayed for a minute because I was confused, then it kicked me out, I was thinking that either the host banned or booted me out of the game because of the situation, but the, maybe host, banned me but it said something like,‚Äù No Hacking, please stop!‚Äù But I was NOT hacking!! I‚Äôm just a normal player!! And the creator, please fix this bug, it‚Äôs getting annoying...Thanks.

title: Awesome app just needs one thing-
text:
I‚Äôm sure anyone who has played this game will agree with me on one thing; it‚Äôs such a good game in both graphics and the basic game idea!!! There is so many different options for accessorizing and cool maps to explore! There is nothing wrong with the game except sometimes there are minor glitches such as the task bar doesn‚Äôt upload when a crew-mate finishes a task (Most people see this as a suspicious activity), sometimes there are two of the same color in the game, and sometimes it doesn‚Äôt let you vote. Overall this game is awesome and deserves five stars from everyone! This is just a mere suggestion but, could you add an option you can use when you either accidentally clicked on the wrong person to eject or if you want to change your vote? Because this has happened to me so many times and I‚Äôve lost because of it often too! I hope the developers will add this option! One more thing- 
I think this game could be more awesome of you could have a friend option! Like you can friend online people and later when you want to, you can invite them to play if they are online!

title: Good game but I have some suggestions
text: This game was really fun to play at first but it got boring because there were some glitches. But I have a suggestion maybe there can be a way to turn the quick chat off. And block out all the inappropriate language so  no one will be able to see that . It‚Äôs better to explain with your own appropriate words instead of using the quick chat. I thought it will be fun to have levels. title: Awesome game!!

title: Wait time change
text: I am pleased with the new update although I have a little concern on the wait time when you intentionally disconnect from a server. People have to wait 33 mins before entering the game completely and I find that a little...long? Unimpressive? Maybe shorten the wait time to maybe 5 or 10 mins because I'm sure people wouldn't want to wait 33 mins to get back into the game so maybe shorten the time just a bit? Overall I am glad to see the game has finally updated, it's good to see all you can do and finally wear without paying like before. I like the new loading screens when you get into the game and how they tell you what "role" you are. Brings a little more excitement to it. All I ask is maybe change the wait time when disconnected from the server so you won't lose people playing. Im sure if people were playing with friends and disconnected to buy hats or other stuff with the new paying method wouldnt want to wait 33 mins to get back to their friends and play. Please take my opinion into consideration as I think this will make the game lose interest and if you lowered it Im sure people would still keep playing! Thank you for your time.

title: Mixed feelings ig
text: I recently updated among us and idk how to feel. The new chat feature is weird. I get that it‚Äôs there for younger children but I feel so dumb using it especially since I‚Äôm on the older side. It takes too long to put in what you want to say and I can‚Äôt even say half the things I want to. One thing I liked about public lobbies was getting to know the other players. Like talking to them between games and joking around with each other and maybe even getting each other‚Äôs discords or something so that we can play again. But I can‚Äôt do that anymore and it made the game a lot less fun imo. One suggestion I would make is having the option to turn that feature off since I do still think it‚Äôs great for kids about 10 and under, it‚Äôs pretty useless to the rest of us tho lol. Or maybe a feature that sensors chat before you send the message in order to avoid inappropriate people. Although I don‚Äôt like the chat very much I am very happy with the new airship map! I think it‚Äôs a cool addition to the among us maps! Also that you for fixing polus! It looked so weird for a little bit there. It‚Äôs my personal fav and I‚Äôm happy it‚Äôs back to normal!! Anyways thank you for reading this, have a good day/night and stay safeüíï

title: It is fun but has some problems
text: This game is super fun and I love to play! However, it has some problems to be fixed! Many reviews have already mentioned these: suggestions of friend requests, issues with being kicked, issues with not being able to kick, etc. One of the biggest issues I face while playing the game is the amount of people who simply leave mid-game. When the game first starts, usually two people leave right away. I‚Äôm assuming it‚Äôs because they got crewmate and wanted impostor but it could be something else. Then, some people will play as groups and as soon as one of their groups gets killed in the game, they all leave. It‚Äôs not fun when 6 people leave at once and you‚Äôre left with four people, two of which are impostors. It makes the game impossible. I‚Äôm not sure how to fix this rather than creating some sort of time-out time for leaving in the middle of games. On the other hand, I have gotten disconnected from the game quite a few times so this could be happening too, but I do think quite a few people just leave mid-game because they can. It really prevents people from being able to play a complete game and I haven‚Äôt played a good game in days because of this issue.

title: it's good, but...
text: the new update where we cant talk ruins the entire game. i understand completely that threats and violence has been said in the chats, but cant you just have it to where it has an option for safe text mode it just forcibly apply a safe text mode where it filters out bad words *like some other apps...*. i have completely stopped playing among us and so have MANY other people just because of the new text update. there are so many things i could go into description about the new text update, but mainly the fact that we cant talk freely and all the chat has to be already there. and if we want to say just "i saw yellow kill blue." we have to select like 80 different things, and not to mention memorize their names. plus the game just gets boring after awhile and that's inevitable, but this just sped up the process by 80%. i did a poll and 700k people voted and 74% said that the whole reason they stopped playin among us was because of this update. please, this game has a lot of potential and that is why it was trending for a while, but it is also just really fun in general already, but this whole chose-your-text thing just ruins almost everything. i beg of you, whoever is reading this, share this around so that the creators can make the chat how it used to be üò∞!!

title: A game that I still love but getting harder to love
text: I love among us but the recent updates have added more restrictions to the younger people. Part of this update was to go to your parents and ask for permission when the kids (probably) asked already to get it. The quick chat option just to put it out there it stinks. It still lacks variety, and it limits your opinions to say what you saw! Also now people have to give some private information like their debit/credit card numbers, or let‚Äôs say you give the last 4 digits of your social security card that will make people very sus of innersloth. Honestly at least make it were we can go back to the old days without all of the new restrictions! Having the report player will be great and can make it that it‚Äôs safer for the younger players without going thru the struggles of all the new stuff. You can make it were that you rank how bad they are and get them banned for a few days, and give everyone a free account that if they pay they can get a better upgrade to their account. So PLEASE make it back to when everyone has more fun! The new restrictions caused a LOT of people to leave the fandom. And I ask again PLEASE turn it back but with a reporting system.

title: Good game but many problems
text: To start off, I‚Äôll talk about the new update. The new map is big, which I enjoy but there‚Äôs some glitches/problems I have with it and many others seem to too. The doors in electrical can open RANDOMLY which is confusing to many and no one really seems to like it, the new chat rule causes a LOT of misinformation/miscommunication and you can barely say anything that you need to say. Again with the map, the random overhangs (I forgot the name) are really confusing and people can barely get from room to room without walking into walls and going into the wrong room because of an entrence you can‚Äôt even relize is there. With the older version before this, some glitches that I don‚Äôt like (the glitches are still here) are that it randomly votes fo you when you vote for one person, when let‚Äôs say it says 2/10 when u go on it it says it‚Äôs full with EVERY SERVER but it keeps showing up, there are many others but I don‚Äôt have the time to state them but these are also the first that come to mind but because of these things many people have already grown off of Among Us just from the last update. In my opinion, if at least the chat problem was fixed/changed, most people would keep playing but this is just my opinion.

title: Nice done but something about players...
text:
This game is pretty go but, those people that slur or being toxic could ruin others feeling and gameplay. They can just do something to those players. title: Please read me Innersloth!!!

title: Ages 9+???
text:
I really feel like there needs to be a way to report people on among us. I have come across some really disgusting conversations within the game between people. If kids starting from the age of 9+ can play this game there should be a way to report people saying explicit inappropriate things. Each person should get a profile and there should be a system of reporting people. Yes you can kick people out of a server but you have to also get three other people to do too or be the one who made the server. There needs to be a better system in place. There has been a time where I entered a server and someone was trying to get personal information out of a 12 year old (at least that is how old the person said they were). That is NOT okay. Luckily other people within the server stepped in and we told the kid not to share that information but there really needs to be a system in place. 
There have also been times of people bullying other people. This is also not okay and just another reason there needs to be a way to report people for misconduct. 
I did not find this game to have a safe environment for me or for children. It is a great concept but not at all what I would consider safe for children at the age of 9. This needs to be fixed ASAP.

title: Wowowow

title: Great game! Couple of suggestions.

title: Great app, couple issues
text: Among us is a great game and you should definitely download if sci-fi whodunnits interest you. The reason I give it four stars is because ever since I‚Äôve had the game, it‚Äôll crash every four to five games. Plus, it crashes a lot if I try to use the chat, which is somewhat a key part in playing, because like what if I know the impostor? Crashes and I can‚Äôt help the other crew mates. I eventually just got used to the crashes, sometimes they go away for a two-week period, but nonetheless, the crashes always come back. Recently after the quick chat feature was released, I went to my settings but I didn‚Äôt have the mode. Thinking I might have it the following week (this was on a weekend), I just left it alone. The next day, I opened among us again, but this time it crashed before I could even get in. Went out of the app and back, same thing. I asked a friend to check this for me, and she said hers was working fine. I then updated the app. Same thing. Deleted and downloaded. Same thing. Shut down the device. Same thing. Today (the next day), it‚Äôs STILL happening, which means I cannot play one of my favorite games! Anyway, this is a great app, just beware of crashes.

title: Wow
text: This game is absolutely fantastic. It‚Äôs really unique, has a fun art style, is filled with loads of Easter eggs, and is really easy to pick up, but takes lots of practice to be good at. It‚Äôs really fun, and I love that you can change the rule settings to make the game more suitable to your preferences. However, on that note, I would really appreciate it if you could search for games with specific rule sets. For example, I would be able to specify that I only wanted to play games with player speeds under 2x. Also, I think it would be fun if, in the settings, you could turn on and off things like the task bar, vents, and certain crises. Finally, I would like a more organized system that decides whether or not you are the impostor in a game. For example, for every game you play as a crew mate, your chances for being impostor on the next game increase. I think this would help solve the problem of all the annoying people that join a game, and then leave as soon as they find out that they are not an impostor. Overall, this game is amazing and I think InnerSloth deserves all of the attention they are getting from it and more. Great job, guys, I really appreciate your work!

title: Great game but a few ideas on the new updates
text: I like this game a lot and it's really interesting to have to make up alibis and try new strategies but there are few things that take away from the entertainment value. First of all, the quick chat feature makes it hard to communicate with other players so it's hard to get involved in a scenario where players actually have to make solid arguments. Ive noticed that avid players have started playing less since the feature was added because there simply isn't the same amount of excitement when half the lobby can't even respond with anything other than basic details. The second problem I see in the game is on the new spaceship map. Unlike in the previous maps, the meeting room only has one point of entry. Although more than one person is able to climb on a ladder at the same time, the imposter could easily guard the top of the ladder and prevent crewmates from pushing the button. Guarding the button can be a good strategy at times but on all the other maps, there have been multiple directions that the table can be reached by which increases the chance that a crew mate could be able to escape the imposter by calling a meeting.

title: Not the best anymore.

Every single game I‚Äôve joined since the quick chat update, nobody even talked, they just voted and the imposter always won. I don‚Äôt see the point in playing with quick chat, it‚Äôs not fun and there‚Äôs no point in even playing. If I was able to actually make and account it would be fine. But the fact that I can‚Äôt even make my own name is also very annoying. title: Game denial
text:
This is a fantastic game with easy rules and amazing gameplay system but there is one simple problem. I‚Äôm getting blocked from playing when I opt out of too many matches, this is a really silly rule in the fact that I probably opt out of 20 games a day or more, this results in the denial of playing time for five and then ten minutes at a time. My reasons for opting out are simple, people are weird, they do stupid things and I don‚Äôt feel comfortable. I should be able to leave a game whenever I want for whatever reason I want any time with no problem, but no, you guys feel the need to block me for five and then ten minutes because I don‚Äôt feel comfortable playing with the audience that I joined. I understand your reasoning though, your goal is create matches where everyone joins and plays fairly without too many people leaving to make the game not fun but this rule is silly and not necessary for games because people opt out anyway with no regard and it effects those who would just like to play with the right crowd. 

Thank you for your time and please make the adjustment so that we can play with the right crowd without silly punishments.
